GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.10.159
GSD.description:
tipc: call tipc_lxc_xmit without holding node_read_lock

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.159 by commit cc668fddde4262f608baca2c9d85b9cf333e41c3, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit f73b12812a3d1d798b7517547ccdcf864844d2cd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tipc: call tipc_lxc_xmit without holding node_read_lock
OSV.details:
tipc: call tipc_lxc_xmit without holding node_read_lock
